StonelordArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Stonelord Paladin archetype regardless of race.

GreenFaith.Description: Allows you to select the Green Faith Deity.

Baphomet.Description: Allows you to select Baphomet as a Deity.

Areshkegal.Description: Allows you to select the Areshkegal as a Deity.

Deskari.Description: Allows you to select Deskari as a Deity.

Kabriri.Description: Allows you to select Kabriri as a Deity.

LichDeity.Description: Allows you to select the Knight Commander as a Deity.

Pulura.Description: Allows you to select Pulura as a Deity.

Milani.Description: Adds the minor goddess Milani, also known as the Everbloom, is the patron of all those who fight against oppression and unjust rule. Her symbol is a rose growing out of a blood-soaked street.

Ragathiel.Description: Adds the minor deity Ragathiel, who is a tower of glorious might. He stands almost 20 feet tall, and five lofty burning wings stretch from his back.

Arshea.Description: Adds the angel empyreal Lord Arshea, a champion of the repressed and weary. Arshea provides mortals deliverance from their bonds.
